appointment.description: Coordinates dates, checks calendar availability, and books appointments automatically — no back-and-forth needed.

receptionist.description: Answers every call to your business 24/7. Routes calls, takes messages, and handles common questions instantly.

customerService.title: Customer Support
customerService.description: Handles inquiries, complaints, and FAQs across all channels. Escalates complex issues to human agents when needed.

reactivation.title: Database Reactivation
reactivation.description: Massively contacts old leads and dormant customers via phone, email, or WhatsApp to bring them back.

followUp.title: Automated Follow-Up
followUp.description: Sends timely follow-up messages and reminder calls to keep prospects engaged throughout the sales cycle.

t1.text: Genoma AI transformed how we handle leads. Our response time went from hours to seconds, and our booking rate increased by 40%.
t1.name: Carlos Mendoza

t2.text: The white-label solution is a game changer. We now offer AI agents as a premium service to all our clients with zero development cost.
t2.name: Laura Vásquez

t3.text: We replaced our call center with Genoma AI agents. Same quality, 70% less cost. The GoHighLevel integration made it seamless.
t3.name: Roberto Silva

q1.question: What is Genoma AI?
q1.answer: Genoma AI is a SaaS platform that lets you create and deploy conversational AI agents that can handle phone calls, WhatsApp messages, web chat, and more. Our agents integrate natively with GoHighLevel and other CRMs.

q2.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
q2.answer: Not at all. Genoma AI is designed to be no-code. You can configure your AI agent in minutes using our intuitive interface. No developers required.

q3.question: What languages do the AI agents support?
q3.answer: Our agents support English and Spanish natively, with natural-sounding voices powered by ElevenLabs. Additional languages are available on request.

q4.question: How does the white-label program work?
q4.answer: With our Agency plans, you get a fully branded version of the platform with your logo, domain, and custom pricing. Your clients never see the Genoma AI brand.

q5.question: Can I integrate with my existing CRM?
q5.answer: Yes! We offer native integration with GoHighLevel, and we also support connections via Zapier, Make, and direct API for other CRMs like HubSpot, Salesforce, and more.

q6.question: Is there a free trial?
q6.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial so you can test the platform before committing. No credit card required to start.

q7.question: What's included in the free CRM?
q7.answer: Every plan includes a full-featured CRM with contact management, pipeline tracking, conversation history, and basic automation. It's everything you need to manage your leads.

ctaFinal.title: Ready to Automate Your Business?
ctaFinal.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses already using Genoma AI to close more deals, faster.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To democratize access to conversational AI for businesses and agencies in the Americas. We believe every business deserves an AI agent that works 24/7, sounds natural, and integrates seamlessly with their existing tools.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Genoma AI was born from a simple observation: businesses lose thousands of dollars every month in missed calls and unqualified leads. Founded by Amilcar Leon, an indie hacker and digital nomad based in Winter Park, Florida, Genoma AI combines cutting-edge AI technology with practical business automation to solve real problems for real businesses.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We push the boundaries of what's possible with conversational AI.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.text: Powerful technology should be easy to use. No code, no complexity.

results.title: Results
results.text: We measure our success by the results our clients achieve.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.text: We grow when our agencies and clients grow. Your success is our success.

footer.description: Genoma AI is a leading platform for AI-powered conversational agents. We help businesses and agencies automate customer interactions, qualify leads, and scale operations with intelligent automation.
